reviewText: This was not a dvd but a cd for computer and it did not work well on my Vista machine. Once I finally was able to figure out how to get the parts of it to play it is a typical Pristine presentation for the first 30-45 minutes. Finally at about 55 minutes in he started sharing what the Pristine Method is. All in all it was good information it just took a long time to get the information I was looking for.
